title: Flame Trap
summaries: The Flame Trap is a trap found naturally in the Jungle Temple. When activated, it fires a jet of fire, which has a range of 20 ([img:Nintendo 3DS version] 47) tiles, and can pierce an infinite number of targets. It has a cooldown of (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 3.33 seconds / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 3 seconds between firings. The flame deal 80 / 160 / 240 damage to players (40 damage to NPCs, enemies, and critters).
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Flame Traps can be rotated 90° with a hammer.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Unlike Lihzahrd Bricks, breaking Flame Traps does not require the Picksaw.

statistics.Sell: 20 SC
